name: Jellicent
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: The fate of ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitats: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: Does 20 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon.
